helpCommands.description: Get the list of available commands via DM
Get information about DAL difficulty and the blocks
Get the address to deposit DAL into your DallarBot Wallet
Withdraw DAL from your DallarBot Wallet. Bot will request your address via DM
Withdraw DAL from your DallarBot Wallet. Bot will automatically transfer to the address specified
Send DAL from your DallarBot Wallet to another user's DallarBot Wallet
Give DAL from your DallarBot Wallet to another user's DallarBot Wallet
Send DAL from your DallarBot Wallet to another user's DallarBot Wallet
